articles.title: From contagion to sanctions, Europe's banks brace for Russia fallout - Reuters
articles.description: European banks on Tuesday were bracing for fallout and fresh sanctions after Russia ordered troops into breakaway regions of eastern Ukraine, with HSBC warning of market contagion and Austria's Raiffeisen Bank International readying "crisis plans".

articles.title: ESA's Solar Orbiter captures a huge eruption from the Sun - Daily Mail
articles.description: The burst of radiation erupted from the side of the Sun facing away from Earth and extended millions of miles into space, the European Space Agency said.
articles.content:
A huge eruption from the sun has been caught on camera by the European Space Agency's (ESA) Solar Orbiter probe.
